name: Shoot Them
description:
A group of beautiful girls seemingly harmless to human beings and animals are actually clone female soldiers transformed by war scientists. They are not afraid of pain or death. They can smell the breath of the target a hundred miles away. As an enlisted human warrior, you are used to verify the actual combat performance of these clone female soldiers. In this prison simulation city, only one person can live...

Just shoot!


The game includes:

Three different enemies of beautiful girls

Two different maps

More than 10 different levels

Infinite ammo mode
